snippet: The Swiss chocolate maker Barry Callebaut agreed on Wednesday to acquire the cocoa division of Petra Foods of Singapore for $950 million.
abstract: The Swiss chocolate maker Barry Callebaut agreed on Wednesday to acquire the cocoa division of Petra Foods of Singapore for $950 million.
lead_paragraph: The Swiss chocolate maker Barry Callebaut agreed on Wednesday to acquire the cocoa division of Petra Foods of Singapore for $950 million. Barry Callebaut, whose clients include Hershey, said the deal would allow it to gain market share in the fast-growing countries in Asia. Read more »

headline.main: Barry Callebaut to Buy Cocoa Unit for $950 Million
